name: FEDERAL MANAGERS ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Support for Hanabusa-Jones amendment to NDAA (H.R. 5515) to repeal cuts to long-term TDY per diems for Department of Defense Employees.
Support of managerial training programs across the federal government; support for extension of the probationary period; support for a repeal of reductions to long term TDY per diem allowances within
Support for Hanabusa-Jones amendment to NDAA (H.R. 5515) to repeal cuts to long-term TDY per diems for Department of Defense Employees. Support for Hirono Amendment to Senate version of NDAA.
